Author

Kalash Singhal.

Examples

library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

# Minimum dataset
crucial <- c("input_co2", "input_sector", "unit")
data <- ictr_inputs |>
  slice(1L) |>
  select(all_of(crucial))
data
#> # A tibble: 1 × 3
#>   input_co2 input_sector unit         
#>       <dbl> <chr>        <chr>        
#> 1      73.6 transport    metric ton*km

ictr_score_inputs(data) |> glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 11
#> $ input_co2      <dbl> 73.58
#> $ input_sector   <chr> "transport"
#> $ unit           <chr> "metric ton*km"
#> $ perc_all       <dbl> 1
#> $ perc_unit      <dbl> 1
#> $ perc_sec       <dbl> 1
#> $ perc_unit_sec  <dbl> 1
#> $ score_all      <chr> "high"
#> $ score_unit     <chr> "high"
#> $ score_sector   <chr> "high"
#> $ score_unit_sec <chr> "high"

# With fewer columns returns an error
data2 <- data |> select(-unit)
try(ictr_score_inputs(data2))
#> Error in group_by(inputs %>% mutate(perc_all = rank(.data$input_co2)/length(.data$input_co2)),  : 
#>   Must group by variables found in `.data`.
#> ✖ Column `unit` is not found.

# Additional columns are added to the output
data3 <- data |> mutate(new = 1)
ictr_score_inputs(data3) |> relocate(new)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 12
#>     new input_co2 input_sector unit    perc_all perc_unit perc_sec perc_unit_sec
#>   <dbl>     <dbl> <chr>        <chr>      <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>         <dbl>
#> 1     1      73.6 transport    metric…        1         1        1             1
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: score_all <chr>, score_unit <chr>, score_sector <chr>,
#> #   score_unit_sec <chr>

# You may customize thresholds
data4 <- ictr_inputs |>
  slice(1:3) |>
  select(all_of(crucial))

# Default
ictr_score_inputs(data4) |>
  relocate(starts_with("score_"))
#> # A tibble: 3 × 11
#>   score_all score_unit score_sector score_unit_sec input_co2 input_sector  unit 
#>   <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr>              <dbl> <chr>         <chr>
#> 1 medium    high       high         high                73.6 transport     metr…
#> 2 high      high       high         high                96   infrastructu… kg   
#> 3 medium    medium     high         high                39.1 electricity   metr…
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: perc_all <dbl>, perc_unit <dbl>, perc_sec <dbl>,
#> #   perc_unit_sec <dbl>

# Custom
ictr_score_inputs(data4, low_threshold = 1, high_threshold = 2) |>
  relocate(starts_with("score_"))
#> # A tibble: 3 × 11
#>   score_all score_unit score_sector score_unit_sec input_co2 input_sector  unit 
#>   <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr>              <dbl> <chr>         <chr>
#> 1 low       medium     medium       medium              73.6 transport     metr…
#> 2 medium    medium     medium       medium              96   infrastructu… kg   
#> 3 low       low        medium       medium              39.1 electricity   metr…
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: perc_all <dbl>, perc_unit <dbl>, perc_sec <dbl>,
#> #   perc_unit_sec <dbl>
